title: Graph Machine Learning
contents: We design neural networks for graphs, combining GNNs with probabilistic inference and self-supervised learning to solve complex, real-world problems.

title: ML on Time Series
contents: We develop models to predict and analyze time series data, uncovering relationships between variables to improve machine learning in forecasting, finance and beyond.

title: Recommender Systems
contents: We build personalized recommender systems that capture both user preferences and global trends, using graphs and time series for multi-modal recommendations.

title: Anomaly Detection
contents: We use self-supervised learning to detect unseen anomalies without labeled data, focusing on efficient data augmentation and robust model selection.
